instance_type.description: The type of instance to start

stack_id.description: The id of the stack the instance will belong to.

layer_ids.description: The ids of the layers the instance will belong to.

state.description: The desired state of the instance.  Can be either `"running"` or `"stopped"`.

install_updates_on_boot.description: Controls where to install OS and package updates when the instance boots.  Defaults to `true`.

auto_scaling_type.description: Creates load-based or time-based instances.  If set, can be either: `"load"` or `"timer"`.

availability_zone.description: Name of the availability zone where instances will be created

ebs_optimized.description: If true, the launched EC2 instance will be EBS-optimized.

architecture.description: Machine architecture for created instances.  Can be either `"x86_64"` (the default

ami_id.description: The AMI to use for the instance.  If an AMI is specified, `os` must be `"Custom"`.

os.description: Name of operating system that will be installed.

root_device_type.description: Name of the type of root device instances will have by default.  Can be either `"ebs"` or `"instance-store"`

ssh_key_name.description: Name of the SSH keypair that instances will have by default.

agent_version.description: The AWS OpsWorks agent to install.  Defaults to `"INHERIT"`.

tenancy.description: Instance tenancy to use. Can be one of `"default"`, `"dedicated"` or `"host"`

virtualization_type.description: Keyword to choose what virtualization mode created instances

root_block_device.description: Customize details about the root block

ebs_block_device.description: Additional EBS block devices to attach to the

id.description: The id of the OpsWorks instance.

availability_zone.description: The availability zone of the instance.

ssh_key_name.description: The key name of the instance

public_dns.description: The public DNS name assigned to the instance. For EC2-VPC, this

public_ip.description: The public IP address assigned to the instance, if applicable.

private_dns.description: The private DNS name assigned to the instance. Can only be

private_ip.description: The private IP address assigned to the instance
